user.description: Please select your device. You will be prompted to add any required secrets on the next page. You can add more than one device, but this must be done one at time. NOTE: If you have more than one Shelly installed, please do not set these up through here. Contact your installer so we can add them manually.
user.title: Devices

shelly_selector_heater.title: Shelly selector
shelly_selector_heater.description: Select an entity that corresponds to the shelly on your immersion heater. It should look something like 'sensor.shelly_em_abcd123_ip'

shelly_selector_meter.title: Shelly selector
shelly_selector_meter.description: Select an entity that corresponds to the shelly on your utility meter. It should look something like 'sensor.shelly_em_abcd123_ip'
